naslov: PRODAJA - VILA S BAZENOM 220m2 - STARA NOVALJA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - VILA 220m2 - STARA NOVALJA 30m OD MORA ! POGLED NA MORE ! Prodajemo modernu vilu s bazenom u Staroj Novalji. Nalazi se iznad ceste, drugi red do mora. Udaljena je svega 10min pješice od plaže Planjka. Vila ukupne površine od 220m2, sastoji se od prizemlja, prvoga i drugoga kata. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, hodnik, toalet i tuš. Iz dnevnog boravka izlazi se na terasu s bazenom i sunčalištem. Bazen je s preljevom i masažom veličine 10 x 5m (dolazi s kompletnom dodatnom opremom kao što su slapovi za masažu i automatski dozatori). Unutarnjim stepeništem dolazi na prvi kat na kojem se nalaze 3 spavaće sobe, od kojih dvije imaju izlaz na terasu s pogledom a jedna i vlastitu kupaonicu, i još jedna odvojena kupaonica. Drugi kat sastoji se od zatvorenog dijela u kojem je prostor za teretanu, s izlazom na prostranu terasu s pogledom na se nalazi hidromasažna kada. U dnevnom boravku i master sobi i kupaonici je podno grijanje, a u svim prostorijama i klima uređaji. U vili su postavljena protuprovalna vrata, alarmni sustav, video portafon, električne rolete.. U dvorištu su 2 vanjska parkirna mjesta. Vlasništvo uredno! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - VILLA 220m2 - STARA NOVALJA 30m FROM THE SEA ! SEA VIEW ! We are selling a modern villa with a swimming pool in Stara Novalja. It is located above the road, second row to the sea. It is only a 10min walking distance from Planjka beach. The villa has a total area of ​​220m2, consists of the ground floor, first and second floor. On the ground floor there is a spacious living room with kitchen and dining room, hallway, toilet and shower. From the living room there is a terrace with a swimming pool and a sun deck. The pool is 10 x 5m with overflow and massage (comes with complete additional equipment such as massage waterfalls and automatic dispensers). An internal staircase leads to the first floor, where there are 3 bedrooms, two of which have access to the terrace with a view, and one has its own bathroom, and another separate bathroom. The second floor consists of a closed part where there is space for a gym, with access to a spacious terrace with a view and a hydromassage tub. Floor heating is installed in the living room, master bedroom and bathroom, and air conditioners are installed in all rooms. The villa has burglar-proof doors, an alarm system, a video intercom, electric shutters... There are 2 outdoor parking spaces in the yard. Clean ownership! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
